SEARCH
Package StochasticSimulation

Class Population

java.lang.Object
StochasticSimulation.Population
public class Population extends Object
This class represents a population of individuals in a stochastic simulation. The Population class manages a list of individuals, including operations such as adding, removing, and sorting individuals. It also tracks the best individual and top distributions of individuals over time.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Population(int initialSize, int maxPopulationSize, int[][] matrix, Random random)
    This constructor initializes the population with a given size and matrix, and randomly creates initial individuals.

    • Population

      public Population(int initialSize, int maxPopulationSize, int[][] matrix, Random random)
      This constructor initializes the population with a given size and matrix, and randomly creates initial individuals.
      Parameters:
      initialSize - the initial size of the population
      maxPopulationSize - the maximum size of the population
      matrix - the matrix representing the system
      random - the random object used for generating individuals
